1.4.1.name: connect20/mw_mapple
1.4.1.description: With the purpose of support your e-business for free, Mage-World is glad to introduce new free theme mApple. This Magento theme has the advantage of clean and clear design which is suitable for wide variety of products.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
